name: Hunt Hide Run
description:
There are two teams: Hunters and Runners.
Hunters have to find and kill all Runners before time runs out.

HUNT!
Hunters use blades that are very dangerous for Runners.


HIDE!
Runners can hide in different spots… even among fake bots!


RUN!
Run away from Hunters if they find you!


Match Settings
Host can change some match settings: characters’ velocity, round time, jump height, etc.
